name: ob_end_clean
purpose: Clean (erase) the output buffer and turn off output buffering

return.description:
Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure. Reasons for failure are first that you called the
   function without an active buffer or that for some reason a buffer could
   not be deleted (possible for special buffer).

errors: If the function fails it generates an E_NOTICE.

changelog.change: The boolean return value was added.
